metadata.description: Darkstalkers: The Night Warriors continues the dark, devillish tale of the mythological creatures who battle for supremacy in a twisted world of fear and vengeance. It's man VS demon, robot VS mummy, succubus VS vampire, and more, as the creatures of the night battle for control of the darkness! Lovers of horror films, martial arts action, ghoulish folklore and gorgeous artwork will find plenty to sink their teeth into with this new Darkstalkers series! Based on the fan-favourite video game series from CAPCOM!
metadata.name: Darkstalkers: The Night Warriors
